text: the more I travel the more I realized
that 99.9% of humans are good people
they are humble friendly and hospitable
[Music]
it might not appear that way when you
turn on your TV but when you're
constantly meeting eye to eye with
people from every corner of the world
it's just the honest truth was your name
we just picked him up and he's gonna
help us find the place where I've come
to realize that all seven point six
billion humans from Somalia to Samoa to
Spain have the same wants and needs to
eat to sleep to laugh to love and to
work countless times when I've been
completely lost in a foreign country
someone has offered their hand and even
a bed to sleep in it doesn't matter if
we cannot communicate it doesn't matter
that I'm American and Jewish and have
red hair
nobody cares about these things all it
takes is a simple smile and everyone can
smile in the same language the world is
a very safe place and it pains me to
think that the media has instilled fear
in our minds this is what motivates me
to keep making travel videos so I can
show you the happy and positive sides of
the world of course I am NOT blind to
the fact that terrorist attacks happen
and that people get murdered every
country has good people and bad people
but remember that it's the point one
percent who are the bad guys you are
five times more likely to get struck by
lightning than be a victim of one
terrorist attack so please I urge you
not to let the media scare you away from
seeing the world's most beautiful sights
meeting the most welcoming people and
learning about places that you never
knew existed I can guarantee you that
life is much better this way
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
